Talk34:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL>Thanks for sharing!


<sp:3:0:2:0000>Let's see... <sp:5:0:0>How many wells left? Oh!
There's still a total of <clr:0000><sp:2:e:2c:2600570065006c006c0044006900730063006f007600650072004e0075006d004c00650066007400ffff00cd> to find<clr:ffff>.
Talk35:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Chat_01>Water quality, fair...<sp:5:1:0> Moss growth, extensive...<sp:5:1:0>
Brightcaps, present... <sp:5:1:0>All right, that's everything.
All jotted down.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk22:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL>Thanks for sharing. I'm excited to go
visit all of these wells!

<sp:3:0:2:0000>Let's see...<sp:5:0:0> How many left across Hyrule?
Oh! There's still a total of <clr:0000><sp:2:e:2c:2600570065006c006c0044006900730063006f007600650072004e0075006d004c00650066007400ffff00cd> to find<clr:ffff>.
Talk23:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Ease_00>Hmm, I don't think there are any wells
you haven't told me about before.
Talk10:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughL>I can't wait! Now, which well should I
visit first...
Talk11:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_01>Wells are endlessly fascinating.


<sp:3:0:2:0000>Their damp environment...<sp:5:0:0>their unique
systems of life...<sp:5:0:0>how they stay cool when
it's hot outside.
Talk24:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice_00>Do you happen to know of more well
locations? I'd love to know about them.
Talk25:
<sp:3:0:2:0100>Let's chat again if you find any more
well locations.
Talk12:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_00>Though rare, <clr:0000>Fairy<clr:ffff> sightings are possible
inside wells.

<sp:3:0:2:0000>They're floaty and tough to catch, but
you can manage pretty well if you
approach them niiice and sneaky.
Talk00:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS_01>Huh? What are you doing in a place
like THIS?

Although...<sp:5:0:0>I'm in a place like this.
Talk26:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>I thought so.<sp:5:0:0> My name's Fera. I have a
deep love of wells too.
Talk13:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>My dream is to travel around to every
single well throughout Hyrule.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>After scouring all the ancient text I could
find on the subject, I've learned that
there are <clr:0000><sp:2:e:2e:2800570065006c006c0044006900730063006f007600650072004e0075006d0054006f00740061006c00ffff00cd> wells<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Sigh_01>Sadly, I haven't been able to identify
their exact locations.
Talk27:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Sigh_00>Really? I hoped you'd have a deep love
of wells, like I do.<sp:5:1:0> Nice to meet you
anyway. My name's Fera.
<sp:3:0:2:0100>Still, you are here. That must mean you
don't mind them. Wells, that is.
Talk14:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:QuestionSurprise_01>Really? That's fantastic!<sp:5:1:0> All right, then.
Tell me everything!
Talk01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Hey, it's you!


<sp:3:0:2:0100>I'm fascinated by the many old wells
across Hyrule, but new wells are pretty
interesting too. Like this one.
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice_00>Oh! Have you come to tell me about the
location of more wells you've found?
Talk15:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sigh_01>Whaaat?<sp:5:0:0> Why keep all those well spots
to yourself?

<sp:3:0:2:0701>But, all right...<sp:5:1:0> Let's talk again sometime
if you change your mind.
Talk28:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I see. This well is the first one you've
discovered. Got it!

Of course, I know about this well too,
but a deal's a deal. One location,
one <clr:0000>10 rupee<clr:ffff> reward!
Talk02:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>With that, you've told me the locations
of all <sp:2:e:2e:2800570065006c006c0044006900730063006f007600650072004e0075006d0054006f00740061006c00ffff00cd> wells in Hyrule!

<sp:3:0:2:0100>This...<sp:5:1:0>is something I made, when my
love for wells was really brimming over.
Take it, as a gift from me.
Talk03:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice_00>Oh! I'm going to Lookout Landing next.
There's a well there I want to see!

<sp:3:0:2:0000>So, if you learn more well locations,
meet me there. See you around!
Talk16:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Sometimes <clr:0000>ore deposits<clr:ffff> are exposed
inside wells, you know.

<sp:3:0:2:0100>It always makes me think that if I just
shattered them somehow, I'd find gems
and strike it rich!
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sigh>But I haven't managed to do thatâ€”just
too hard for me to break.
Talk17:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>But if you have any interest in wells, then
maybe you could help me. Would you
tell me any <clr:0000>well locations<clr:ffff> you know of?
Talk04:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You can find wells all over the place in
<clr:0000>towns and stables<clr:ffff>, of course.

<sp:3:0:2:0000>But even more wells, those used in the
distant past, exist within <clr:0000>ruins<clr:ffff>.<clr:0000><clr:ffff>

<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_01>Just imagine! They were a crucial part of
life all that time ago. Isn't that simply
fascinating?
Talk18:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice_00>Oh! I'm still interested in any well spots
you've found. Ready to share them?
Talk05:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>It can be hard to find old, hidden wells.


<sp:3:0:2:0c01>If only there was some sort of <clr:0000>tool for
searching for things<clr:ffff>...
Talk19:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Ah, it's you. This well is nice, isn't it!
Tranquil, in its unique way.

<sp:3:0:2:0000>Oh! Have you reconsidered telling me
what well locations you've been to?
Talk06:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL_01>Truly, thank you.<sp:5:0:0>


Now my dream of seeing all these wells
feels so much closer to reality. I hope
to set off on a journey to visit them all!
Talk07:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice_00>Oh! I'm going to Lookout Landing next.
There's a well there I'd love to see.<sp:5:0:0>
See you around!
Talk08:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_00>Wells hold systems of life that are quite
special, full of <clr:0000>plants and creatures
not seen aboveground<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Caves are dimly lit. Maybe that's why.<sp:5:0:0>
Lots of creatures in them have their own
illumination, like the glowing cave fish.
Talk09:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Ease_00>In their own unique way, wells are very
pleasant. They're nice and <clr:0000>cool even if
it's hot outside<clr:ffff>.
Talk30:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>You seem to be a traveler. So if you've
happened to spot any <clr:0000>wells<clr:ffff>, how
about you tell me their <clr:0000>locations<clr:ffff>?
Talk31:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:TalkPositive_00>I'll reward you, of course. Hmm...<sp:5:1:0> How
does <clr:0000>10 rupees per location<clr:ffff> sound?
Talk32:
<sp:3:0:2:0100>Well enthusiasts just get it. The appeal
of a good well, that is.
Talk20:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Chat_01>Water quality, good... <sp:5:1:0>Moss growth, limited...<sp:5:1:0>
Brightcaps, present...<sp:5:1:0> All right, that's everything.
All jotted down.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk33:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Hey, you wouldn't happen to be...<sp:5:1:0>
a <clr:0000>well enthusiast<clr:ffff>, would you?
